New Records: LeBron James passed Michael Jordan for the most 30-point games in NBA history with his 563rd 30-point game.
LeBron James moved into fourth place for the most number of games played in the NBA with 1,523 games.
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 30 points to help the Los Angeles Lakers to a 119-102 victory over the Atlanta Hawks.
Anthony Davis returned from a one-game absence with an ankle problem to claim 18 points and 19 rebounds.
Austin Reaves had 20 points as the Lakers won their seventh game out of their last nine.
Trae Young had 33 points and nine assists for the Hawks.
Jalen Johnson added 19 points for the Hawks.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed that it was very humbling to be mentioned with the greats like Michael Jordan.
LeBron James mentioned that he idolized Michael Jordan in his childhood and wears number 23 because of him.
